text: Dhaka International Film Festival (DIFF) is a biennial movie festival held in Dhaka, Bangladesh. It was established in 1992. ==Awards== The festival authority chooses and invites Asian and Australian movies to participate in different sections. The sections are: *Retrospective *Cinema of the World *Women Filmmakers *Childrenâ€™s Film *Short and Independent *Spiritual Films ==Other websites== *www.dhakafilmfestival.org Official Website * Category:Movie festivals Category:Bangladeshi culture Category:1992 establishments in Asia
title: Dhaka International Film Festival
